page.title: 05A day in the life of......
page.content:
EMMA HARRIS aged 13 Resident of Plovers Rise,Kempsey
At 7.30 am. my alarm goes off and I get up and get dressed.I go down stairs and have my breakfast.After this I wash and then clean my teeth.At 8.15 am.I leave the house and walk down Plovers Rise to the bus stop on the main road.The bus arrives around 8.20 am..The bus comes from a coach company called Astons which is in the centre of Kempsey.I get on the bus and arrive at school at arond 8.45 am..My school is called Upton-upon-Severn Junior High:next year I go to Hanley Castle High School,which is also in Upton. At 8.50 am. school begins and at 9.25 am.I begin my days lessons.
continued on page 6
